name: firefighter-monorepo
description: FireFighter mono-repo with Angular Ionic Capacitor frontend and Spring Boot backend

scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && npm run install:integration
scripts.dev: powershell -Command "Start-Process cmd -ArgumentList '/c cd backend/firefighter-platform && mvn spring-boot:run -Dspring-boot.run.profiles=dev' ; Start-Process cmd -ArgumentList '/c cd frontend/FireFighter && ng serve'"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test:all: powershell -Command "Start-Process cmd -ArgumentList '/c cd frontend/FireFighter && npm test' ; Start-Process cmd -ArgumentList '/c cd backend/firefighter-platform && mvn test'"
